revised_title: Asymptotic and Numerical Analysis of Nonlinear Acoustic Waves
tldr: The authors present an asymptotic and numerical analysis of the nonlinear evolution of cylindrical and spherical acoustic waves affected by thermoviscous dissipation. They obtain old-age asymptotic solutions for initially discontinuous profiles and validate these solutions with numerical results. The study provides a better understanding of wave behavior and helps predict the evolution of waves in various geometries.
